cause.description:
Get involved with your church's youth group. Do something to spread your love to others. You don't just help others, you meet people from all over the country/world. You grow spiritually and branch out to new relationships.
"Taking one week out of your summer vacation, can change a life forever."
http://www.groupworkcamps.com/
1. Poverty is growing at a rapid rate!
2. Serving others, for the joy of it!
cause.mission: "Help Each Community, One step at A time"
cause.name: GroupWorkcampFoundation
